article: Growing up like all children, when I was growing up all I wanted was to be growth up. I always kept a close eye on my role _ --my parents, and always tried to do anything they did. The skills I learnt and the attitude I acquired from a young age would be of great help to me in my _ years. From the age of four or five, the memories I have are those of _ my parents in their shop and helping them sell goods. The job I did was just _ on the chair so that I could reach the counter and _ at everyone who came in. _ these are so insignificant, I always got a sense of _ and satisfaction in my work. When I was seven years old, I went to primary school and my family moved to the town _ I lived today. At the beginning, everything around me was _ . I felt it hard to breathe _ friends. But my families told me: "Never be a _ ! Keep smiling and try to play with others!" So I tried to smile at others and play with others. Soon, it _ . I got my happiness again. And those words are always in my _ till today. Now, as a high school student, I have a nice class and many charming and _ friends and teachers around me. I feel _ and beautiful! Meanwhile, the support that I have received and _ to receive from my family is always a major _ for me to succeed as well. In my opinion, everyone's growth is full of good and bad experiences all the time. The key is to appreciate the good ones and find a way of turning a negative situation into a _ one.
